00018 class SurfaceFormat
00019 {
00020 public:
00024     enum SurfaceFormatType
00025     {
00027         SURFACE_UNKNOWN,
00029         SURFACE_R8G8B8,
00031         SURFACE_B8G8R8,
00033         SURFACE_A8R8G8B8,
00035         SURFACE_X8R8G8B8,
00037         SURFACE_X8B8G8R8,
00039         SURFACE_A8B8G8R8,
00041         SURFACE_R5G6B5,
00043         SURFACE_R5G5B5,
00045         SURFACE_P4,
00047         SURFACE_P8,
00049         SURFACE_L8,
00051         SURFACE_A1R5G5B5,
00053         SURFACE_X4R4G4B4,
00055         SURFACE_A4R4G4B4,
00057         SURFACE_A1B5G5R5,
00059         SURFACE_R3G3B2,
00061         SURFACE_R3G2B3,
00063         SURFACE_A8,
00065         SURFACE_A8R3G3B2,
00067         SURFACE_A8R3G2B3,
00069         SURFACE_DXT1,
00071         SURFACE_DXT3,
00073         SURFACE_DXT5,
00075         SURFACE_D32,
00077         SURFACE_D24,
00079         SURFACE_D16,
00081         SURFACE_D24S8,
00083         SURFACE_LAST,
00084     };
00085 
00089     SurfaceFormat();
00090 
00094     SurfaceFormat( SurfaceFormatType type );
00095 
00100     SurfaceFormat( int bitCount, uint32_t redMask, uint32_t greenMask, uint32_t blueMask, uint32_t alphaMask );
00101 
00105     SurfaceFormatType   type() const;
00106 
00111     int         bitsPerPixel() const;
00112 
00116     bool        hasAlpha() const;
00117 
00123     uint32_t    getChannelMask( int i ) const;
00124 
00130     int         getChannelBitCount( int i ) const;
00131 
00136     int         paletteEntries() const;
00137 
00141     bool        operator==( const SurfaceFormat& other ) const          {return m_type==other.m_type;}
00142 
00146     bool        operator!=( const SurfaceFormat& other ) const          {return m_type!=other.m_type;}
00147 
00151     bool        compressed() const      {return m_type >= SURFACE_DXT1 && m_type <= SURFACE_DXT5;}
00152 
00156     bool        palettized() const      {return m_type == SURFACE_P8 || m_type == SURFACE_P4;}
00157 
00168     void        copyPixels( void* dst, const SurfaceFormat& dstpalfmt, const void* dstpal,
00169                     const SurfaceFormat& srcfmt, const void* src, const SurfaceFormat& srcpalfmt, const void* srcpal, 
00170                     int pixels ) const;
00171 
00176     void        copyPixels( void* dst, int dstpitch, const SurfaceFormat& dstpalfmt, const void* dstpal,
00177                     const SurfaceFormat& srcfmt, const void* src, int srcpitch, const SurfaceFormat& srcpalfmt, const void* srcpal,
00178                     int width, int height ) const;
00179 
00185     void        getPixel( int x, int y,
00186                         const void* data, int pitch, 
00187                         const SurfaceFormat& palfmt, const void* pal,
00188                         float* rgba ) const;
00189 
00191     const char* toString() const;
00192 
00193 private:
00194     SurfaceFormatType m_type;
00195 };
